channel.title: New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 08/01/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Enhanced Widget Installation: Easily install multiple widgets for SeaChat AI Agent web chat, LINE, WhatsApp, and Messenger on your website by simply copying and pasting one code snippet. Improved Popup Window: Experience a more user-friendly popup window that helps you easily track when hit Knowledge Base quota limit. Enhanced Browser Notifications: New notifications on the browser tab make unread messages more noticeable. Advanced Twilio Call Settings: Configure speed adjustments for both inbound and outbound calls, with options for outbound voicemail to either send a customizable voicemail message or automatically hang up.
